sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import TopNav from '../components/TopNav' import { Container, Card, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { getStudent } from '../services/api' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function StudentProfile(){ const { id } = useParams() const [s, setS] = useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ if(id) getStudent(id).then(d=>setS(d)).catch(()=>setS(null)) },[id]) if(!s) return <> Loading... return ( <>

{s.name}

District: {s.district}

Academic score: {s.academicScore || s.academic_score}

Family Income: {s.familyIncome || s.family_income}

Contact

Profile data

 ) }
